chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This userguide describes how to use Yum Extender

section.title: What is Yum Extender
section.para: Yum Extender is a GUI for the yum package manager that make it easy to unleash the power of the yum.

section.title: How to install Yum Extender
section.para: I fedora you can install Yum Extender by typing the following command in a terminal. yum install yumex
